info.brief_description: Does what it says on the box!
info.description:
First things first, if you haven't realised yet...this is erotica, which basically means it is porn, so don't say I didn't warn you.

In this story you choose a pokemon to be and a pokemon to have "fun" with. Just to let you know.:)

Oh and one more thing, I do not no the newest generations starter names or evolutions, neither do I want to...so plz don't ask about them.

Rules

Plz do not add vore, inflation, watersports or scat of any kind please.
Please either rate and/or review or send me messages with constructive feedback only.
Please send me a message when you add saying what you added, and where it was added into.

All options for your character are sorted, I just need to do the ones to...well...do.
I will reward everyone who adds to this anything from 100 to 10000 GP if I think the content you provide is good.

Thanks and enjoy this interactive fun fest!
